comment._content: We have to be careful here, Jay Gould had two daughters: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Helen_Miller_Gould Helen Miller Gould married Finley Johnson Shepard (1867-1942) on January 22, 1913, and she appears in the other photos in this series in a wedding dress. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anna_Gould Anna Gould married Hélie de Talleyrand-Périgord, Duc de Sagan ‎ (1859-1937) in 1908 George Jay Gould I had two daughters: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Helen_Vivien_Gould Helen Gould married John Graham Hope de la Poer Horsley Beresford (1866-1944), the 5th Baron Decies, on February 7, 1911

comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: Helen's engagement was listed as the event "of the season" because of the aristocratic connection query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?_r=1&res=9F05E... a description of the wedding follows: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9E0CE7DE1439E3... this set has other photos identifying it as this wedding and the background photos match as far as time of year etc. [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/3085241980/]
